attributes.action: Set up a National Unity Government to respond to COVID-19/ Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details:
The outbreak of COVID-19/ Corona Virus represents a national emergency. 

A national unity government consisting of all parties will maximise legitimacy. 

A national unity government is best placed to respond in an emergency situation where assembling public consent on a broad basis is essential.
attributes.background: The government should invite a broad coalition of MPs from various different parties and none to form a new cabinet and government.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301563

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
